DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate the effect of the enteric hormone Glucagon-like Peptide (GLP-2) on patients with short bowel syndrome
DOC.brief_title: Effect of the Enteric Hormone Glucagon-Like Peptide (GLP-2) on the Intestinal Blood Flow in Patients With Short Bowel Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: previous studies have shown that GLP-2 increases mesenteric blow flow, we wish to examine the effect of subcutaneus GLP-2 on patients with short bowl syndrome. The patients will single blinded been given 450 nmol GLP-2 and isotonic saline in order to act as their own reference.
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnose of short bowel syndrome 4 month of stable fase activity in IBD
